b"She has now abandoned the Googler (iPad to you and me but not to her) as it didn't have the answer she was expecting. What a surprise :) GN"
b"When I eventually stopped laughing she asked what part of what she'd said was wrong. What part??? She is now Googling to prove me wrong. GN"
b"She's now just said if you crash in space you don't die, you just float, & you don't age. I think she does well with just 3 brain cells. GN"
b'Just told Gem about Voyager leaving the Solar System after 36 years in space. She asked who was on it & how do they put the petrol in it. GN'
b'Thanks everyone. Both nights at Hollywood Forever, October 17 & 18, have now Sold Out. So looking forward to it. GN http://t.co/l4fMwKflXT'
b'Wayne Hussey from The Mission came to visit on Monday & we watched their excellent gig last night at Club Nokia. GN http://t.co/PaMbjO6O73'
b'Cool pic by David Brendon Hall from the Santa Ana gig last Week. GN http://t.co/HLsxlFgUgX'
b"Thank you to everyone that worked on the video today. Your kindness and generosity is very much appreciated. I'm very grateful. GN"
b"Filmed the video for the 'Love Hurt Bleed' single today. Wilbur was in it :) GN"
b'Smashed a side window in my car yesterday. My fault, stupidly loaded speaker cabinet. Kids thought it was an explosion & panicked. GN'
b'Thanks for helping sell-out the @hwdforever show in Under 10 minutes! Excited to say we\xe2\x80\x99ve added a second date http://t.co/u2fx0rZ2uo GN'
b'Excited to say tickets for @hwdforever Cemetery 17 Oct show are on sale now. #splinter GN http://t.co/iVQ4E2Tcfv VIP http://t.co/JxXlZA0ldl'
b'Big thanks to the band & crew for making the tour such a professional & friendly experience. Looking forward to the next one in October. GN'
b'Fantastic show in Santa Ana last night to end our short west coast tour. Huge thanks to Robin Finck for joining us on stage. Special. GN'
b'Santa Ana tonight. So looking forward to it. Sound check was HUGE. GN'
b"RT @OFFICERSMUSIC: So we're one of the hottest top 10 ten bands across the pond right now. We just need to get over and tour! #USA http://t\xe2\x80\xa6"
b"You can also follow Hollywood Forever's own Twitter page - @hwdforever. GN"
b'Playing a gig to showcase #splinter at Hollywood Forever Cemetery on 17 Oct. Tix on sale 12pm PDT Friday 6 Sep. GN http://t.co/iVQ4E2Tcfv'
b"RT @Josh_Friedman: If you haven't seen the Blackfish doc I highly recommend it. I will never go to Sea World again. Ever. And neither shoul\xe2\x80\xa6"
b"Stopped between SF & LA to watch Echo's 1st day  in Grade 1 school ceremony. Back on the tour bus now. GN http://t.co/PrKe3eMfTh"
b'Oakland tonight was unbelievable. Quite possibly one of the best crowds of my entire career. Thank you. GN'
b"Should you wish to follow my lovely wife's bizarre, offensive & poorly spelt tweets she's @ElfinHaloMoon. I wouldn't if I had a choice :) GN"
b"See, not one dinosaur. So my statement made sense, albeit very dull. Anyway, I'd be a T-Rex. Obviously. GN http://t.co/vKCvkYvNJv"
b'I should perhaps point out that our room is overlooking the docks in Oakland where a ship is being loaded, but no dinosaurs are present. GN'
b'So yes, I am quite boring, and she is a mentalist. Earlier she asked if I ever thought about being a dinosaur. Not really to be honest. GN'
b"I just said to Gem that getting the weight distribution sorted on a container ship must be hard. To which she sang 'I love my titties'. GN"
b'This just out in the OC http://t.co/oM12kkDu0N for the Santa Ana gig & another pic from @suzi123. I love touring. GN http://t.co/lVAYXoCMBN'
b"Gem's decided to try what I believe ladies call Love Balls. She just accidentally fired one into the toilet like a small cannon. V funny. GN"
b'Taken at the Vancouver gig on Friday. Thanks to @FortuneSound for the pic. GN http://t.co/dzE7HmDQJL'
b"Ade Fenton dealing bravely with what follows a rather ambitious night of 'socialising'. GN #laborday http://t.co/7lDzDdqE4Q"
b"Hoping to see The World's End movie this evening as a brilliantly warped reminder of where I'm from. GN #laborday"
b'Happy Labor Day. We are having a badly needed day off in Oakland, CA today. GN http://t.co/DOlx7tmGOf'
b'Portland. Great night. Thanks to everyone for coming. GN'
b'Another photo from last nights Bumbershoot Festival in Seattle. Thanks to @suzi123 for the pic. GN http://t.co/i2OXH2hpZw'
b'Sanctuary Radio are playing I Am Dust as part of their podcast. GN (Follow this link) http://t.co/3mduGmReTh'
b'Sorry, I gave the wrong credit for this pic. Should be @jktang. GN http://t.co/VYIaturAjI'
b"Portland today, playing at The Wonder Ballroom. Here's a pic from last night's festival set by @jgtang. GN http://t.co/aPZd0U0nbG"
b"Main set at Bumbershoot was amazing. I can't believe this is my first ever US festival. Fantastic crowd, fantastic vibe. Loved it. GN"
b'Bumbershoot Festival. Already done several interviews, a radio live session, a DJ set & at 8pm we play our main set. Busy but fun. GN'
b'Here in Seattle now. I have two band sets to play and a DJ set, plus a list of interviews. Busy day ahead. GN'
b"Vancouver was a great gig after all the drama's getting there. Thanks to everyone that came. I really appreciate it. GN"
b'We are through, but 4 hours behind schedule. So we have 2 hours to do all the work that usually takes 6. No pressure :) GN'
b"It isn't going smoothly at all. Been here at the border several hours now & we should have loaded into the gig over two hours ago. GN"
b"We are at the border hoping to cross in to Canada. Hopefully it will go smoothly as the show tonight has sold out. I'd hate to miss it. GN"
b'Eugene, Oregon. I totally apologise for the doubts I had when we arrived. A fantastic crowd. We had the best time, thank you for coming. GN'
b"New age rock lifestyle. Reading your children's school reports on the tour bus.  GN http://t.co/AInj4fCmID"
b'Gemma thinks my Meth clinic Tweet was offensive. I genuinely meant it to be sympathetic, but staying on the bus DID seem a good idea. GN'
b"Just arrived in Eugene, Oregon. We are parked outside a Meth clinic & it's unfortunate visitors. Think I'll stay on the bus. GN"
b'Sacramento went rather well. Congratulations to Mark G Thwaite for getting through his first gig with us. GN http://t.co/Z8InibCufI'
b'A new pic from the Android  In LaLaLand film. GN http://t.co/2lma58ZwEi'
b'And so might this. GN http://t.co/vlI8kvf2lW'
b'For those interested in coming to see us in Portland, or anywhere else for that matter, this might help. GN http://t.co/SLrKbTENUM'
b"I'm in trouble. I forgot to get an anniversary card. Blaming 'being really busy' doesn't seem to be going over too well. GN"
b"Here we are in Sacramento. First gig tonight. It's also our 16th wedding anniversary. GN http://t.co/QI0ct2ahyS"
b'Love Hurt Bleed (single edit) is being played by my good friends at Drag Radio   http://t.co/xkZSEKA6qh on Wednesday around 9pm UK time. GN'
b"Last day of rehearsals. Got some of the lights in today & the projection set up so it's going a little slowly. Looks good though. GN"
b'Had to do something very sad and difficult today. Such a horrible feeling. GN'
b'A good day. #Splinter songs sounding huge. More tomorrow. GN'
b'Rehearsing today. Really looking forward to this next run of gigs. GN'
b'My 1000th tweet! Thanx to everyone for following me & to all those who have pre-ordered #splinter. Very grateful. GN http://t.co/PUDtyyeZEx'
b'Disneyland. I love it. Always have, always will. GN'
b'Another photo shoot & interview this morning. More interviews tomorrow with German press. Then Disneyland. GN'
b"For the last week or two we have been under the impression that Gemma has MS. Found out today she definitely doesn't. Very happy. GN"
b'Checked the test CD copy of the Splinter album today, worked on the set list & lights for the West Coast mini tour that starts very soon. GN'
b'In the UK, my very recent 6Music playlist radio show http://t.co/ajVA181JiF is now up on the BBC iPlayer. GN'
b"Also saw a deer with a really short front leg. Although it may have been dancing. It's hard to tell. GN http://t.co/iigNxpC5MT"
b'Went to Catalina Island today & saw a man walking his pig. Not something you see everyday. GN http://t.co/XjcgZujYkH'
b"Dolphins, porpoises, whatever. I'm not David Attenborough. Did manage this dodgy pic though. GN http://t.co/zoqBCcx3HH"
b'No whales on our whale watching trip but a beautiful sunset, and lots of dolphins. GN http://t.co/CBPoZeQXt7'
b'Meant to be whale watching now but we missed the boat. Typical. Trying for a later boat this evening. Blue Whales! Not seen one before. GN'
b"My new iPad's arrived. Just found out I last backed up the stolen one in late 2012 so a world of info missing. Quite upsetting actually. GN"
b"Pleased to say that @nemonemetaxas @BBC6Music will be playing 'Love Hurt Bleed' tonight on her Electric Ladyland show. GN"
b'#Splinter Pre Sale has had a great first day. Very grateful to everyone for showing so much interest. Thank you. GN http://t.co/PUDtyyeZEx'
b"Thanks for all your support and patience in waiting for #splinter. I'm very proud and excited for you to hear it. GN http://t.co/PUDtyyeZEx"
b'RT @Animals1st: #StopTheGrind Pilot Whale Hunt Faroes June 2012 http://t.co/QBfXQwOrCN'
b'RT @pupaid: Wow over 55K signatures just 45K to go to stop puppy farm cruelty pls sign + RT http://t.co/hXWoAXfdam #wheresmum http://t.co/g\xe2\x80\xa6'
b'More studio & lots of frustrating messy business today. 4 interviews this morning. Oh, & a new pump for the swimming pool. Life in LA :) GN'
b'Check out this BBC 6Music announcement http://t.co/HW2oBp40k2 GN'
b"Studio today. Also photographs, interviews & other Splinter album & tour business. It's pretty much that everyday at the moment. Excited. GN"
b"Big thanks to @shaunwkeaveny @bbc6music for playing 'Love Hurt Bleed' (one of the songs from the new Splinter album). GN"
b"My iPad was stolen today. Apologies to all if you get odd e-mails from my account. I'm in the process of erasing it, new passwords etc. GN"
b'2:20am. Just got home from San Francisco after an 8 hour drive. Got a photo shoot at 11:30. Definitely should have planned things better. GN'
b"Gem's Topamax withdrawal pains continue. Might take a month apparently. That is a NASTY drug. GN"
b'San Fran Festival yesterday. Wrong passes, cold, damp, drizzle, mud. It reminded me of life back in the UK. I do miss a lot but not that.GN'
b'Tweeting is a great way of attempting to be normal when you are actually shitting yourself with fear. And postponing the trip downstairs. GN'
b"So I venture downstairs, without my giant but cowardly dog, hoping it's a child, and find nothing at all. Now that really is unsettling. GN"
b"'I'd Tweet if I were you', said Wilbur the talking dog, 'It might be dangerous downstairs. And no I'm not going first. I'm big, not stupid,'"
b'Nothing more unsettling than waking at 5am to the sound of noise downstairs. Ghost, intruder or fridge raiding child? Bravery or Tweet? GN'
b'Early night. Driving to San Francisco tomorrow for the Outside Lands festival. GN'
b"And big thanks to Q Magazine for this peice on 'I Am Dust' http://t.co/3uORXcbiGG GN"
b'Check out the new trailer for Splinter http://t.co/EK1K3kfTVg from those lovely LaLa people #androidinlalaland GN'
b"So I'm off to watch Elysium. Nothing like a shot of escapism for escaping. GN"
b"To be honest, there's some great stuff going on, & some crap. So I'm balanced in a way that flicks from happy to fucked off once an hour. GN"
b"Gem has been given a drug called Topamax. It's turned her into a panicky  mentalist. 3 more days & she can stop. Horrible stuff. GN"
b"It's in my nature, when things are going well, to worry about what will happen next & so not enjoy the moment fully. I'm doing it now. GN"
b"Home. Big multi car crash on the 405 that we were in the middle of, of as it happened, but didn't hit anyone, or get hit. Looked messy. GN"
b"4am. I think that's about it for Lollapalooza 2013. Great festival. Looking forward to getting home tomorrow. More new songs to finish. GN"
b'Just changed our flights. Decided to stay in Chicago for an extra day to see the Sunday line-up at Lollapalooza. Having a great time. GN'
b'Met some cool people, heard some good music, & some shit to be honest, but overall had a very good, & long, day. GN http://t.co/XQZbarRhdt'
b'Gem just saw these & said "Didn\'t know Boris Beckham was here." WTF. It\'s not her fault, she\'s on drugs. GN http://t.co/qr41L0df39'
b'I thought she did well to keep standing as long as she did. Gemma, post NIN. GN http://t.co/YCajIeu7Z3'
b'Just watched Nine Inch Nails at Lollapalooza. Absolutely phenomenal. Seriously, that was something special. GN'
b"View from our hotel window. And I bet we're still late for the gig we flew all the way here to see. GN http://t.co/PSgNxap5zf"
b'Chicago. Flight Attendant tried to get Gem out the toilet mid No2 due to turbulence. Its not something you can do in stages though is it. GN'
b"We're going to Lollapalooza. Got plane tickets, hotel booked, wife drugged up (prescribed obviously), common sense abandoned. Here we go. GN"
b"So, the Dr says to Gemma. 'You are still very ill, go home, go to bed, total rest.' Where is she? Fucking hairdressers. I kid you not. GN"
b"She's out of hospital. Outside Walgreens now waiting for the DIY drugs. Not sure we'll make Lollapalooza. GN http://t.co/T9AoURQ0o2"
b"6:30am, haven't slept all night. Gemma is coming home today & the Splinter campaign's had a great start. Too excited to sleep I guess. GN"
b'Huge thanks to @jason_bentley @kcrw  for the I Am Dust play today. It means a lot. GN'
b'Gem is being evicted from hospital tomorrow still with Meningitis and a bag full of pills. Just noticed, even her illness has NIN in it:) GN'
b'Check out the trailer http://t.co/CU2ECZf4TI for the new album: Splinter (Songs From A Broken Mind). GN'
b'Very excited to see the @stereogum  Splinter album announcement today. Big thanks to Stereogum, really appreciate it. GN'
b"I'm now on Instagram. You can find me at garynuman and check out the new artwork for 'Splinter (Songs From A Broken Mind)' out Oct 2013. GN"
b"Gem was just told she's going home tomorrow. WTF. She's on 2 IV drips, pain getting worse & more tests scheduled. Wrong room perhaps? GN"
b'Raven, my 9 year old, just said "Dad, you smell nice, like the toilet on the Air New Zealand plane." Compliment or insult? I can\'t tell. GN'
b"Check out my chat with stereogum and 'I Am Dust' official premiere: http://t.co/5JfzWJjjkH"
b"Gem just realised she probably won't make it to Chicago to see Nine Inch Nails this weekend. I thought she was upset before but JESUS :( GN"
b'She had a row with a Dr today. Poor bedside manner. She threw a towel at him & told him to get out. Not bad for someone with Meningitis. GN'
b"They asked Gem 'What pain level, from 0 to 10, would you like to achieve?' Let's go for 0 shall we? Unbelievable. GN http://t.co/Qa63dCyQlU"
b'This is amazing. Something beautiful in a sad time. GN  http://t.co/qJ9wmTGARv'
b"Gemma is having a lumbar picture right now. Hate what she's going through, dreading what they might find. Waiting for news. GN"
b"Just got Netflix to run on Gem's iPad so no more shit hospital TV. THAT cheered her up :) GN"
b"Gem's still in hospital. She's bad again today. Lumbar puncture tomorrow :( They think Meningitis is now most likely but still not sure. GN"
b"We're off to see Turbo. Not used to being a solo parent, feels very wrong and sad. Back to the hospital later. GN http://t.co/gx3A8kyOY0"
b"They just gave her some new drugs & she's totally spannered. Very funny. She's a little better today. GN http://t.co/LyI4jSR8ai"
b"Gem's still there, could be Meningitis, they're still not sure. Might do a lumbar puncture tomorrow, don't envy her that. Still very ill. GN"
b"Gem's still in hospital. MRI scan picked up something unfortunately. We'll know more tomorrow. They don't know what's wrong with her yet. GN"
b'Thank you so much for all your kind messages for Gemma. Quite blown away by it all actually. Very kind. Thank you all. GN'
b'Not a day I would like to go through again. Cried with worry, cried with happiness & relief, just a big cry baby really. Love my wife xx. GN'
b'Gem much worsel today. Dr thought she had a brain tumour. Been in ER all day. Scans clear though so very relieved. Know more tomorrow. GN'
b'I love America but the health care system here is so complicated you could die just trying to find the right FUCKING PHONE NUMBER!!!!!!!! GN'
b"Gemma is unwell. CT scan on Wednesday. Can't deny I'm worried. GN"
b"3 versions of the album cover are now complete & I have to choose 'the one' this evening. Surprisingly anxious about it for some reason. GN"
b'Drove for an hour & a half to a dog friendly beach. Way too cold by time we got there so drove all the way home again. What a fun day. GN'
b'RT @RichardDawkins: Stand with the Maasai against the odious lion hunters. http://t.co/V0Q8WQ06X4 Sign the petition & get it up to 2 millio\xe2\x80\xa6'
b"The kittens are here and all four children are very happy. Meanwhile, I've been working on the album cover artwork for the last two days. GN"
b"Ended up with 3 kittens from the rescue centre. We collect them tomorrow. Feel bad for all those we didn't choose, so many, really sad. GN"
b'21 years ago today I phoned Gemma for the first time. I had no idea it would be the most brilliantly life changing phone call of my life. GN'
b"Gemma's just found out she can't have that cat. Not my fault, rescue centre rules apparently. Guess my anniversary shag is cancelled :( GN"
b"Don't tell Gemma, but I'm letting her have that kitten on Thursday. A 21st anniversary present. She better get me something. NOT A PUPPY. GN"
b'This is our cat Mogwai. Gemma wants another but one angry cat rapist is enough I say (Mogwai has sex issues). GN http://t.co/pODSk2mHMr'
b'Day 22. Just as well really, the journey home is not going as smoothly as hoped. GN http://t.co/vSG6y47yXP'
b'Day 22. Like an oasis drifting out of the shimmering haze, it appeared, and I knew I was saved. GN http://t.co/V22nK8gsvv'
b"Day 22. Sad to be going home today. Despite many drama's with the children, & some scary drives, I've loved our holiday. GN"
b"Day 21. On a really hot day there's nothing better than swimming in a cool stream. Home tomorrow. GN http://t.co/QXRFRn6RK2"
b"Day 21. Sequoia Nat'l Park. Having lunch when a bear and her cub walked by. Couldn't believe our luck :) GN http://t.co/arMqNKDNzZ"
b"Day 20. Echo just threw Raven's shoe out the window. Forget the cinema, I'll show you World War Z. GN"
b"Day 20. Still travelling. Don't know where here is exactly but I don't like it. GN"
b"Day 20. Oops, sorry, already tweeted that last pic. In the Petaluma Denny's at the moment, Gemma hates it :) GN http://t.co/unreFaE7Ji"
b"Day 20. Today we drive to our final stop, King's Canyon. Wish we'd had more time in SF. I really messed that up. GN http://t.co/hS1CqXw2zl"
b"Day 19. Fisherman's Wharf, San Francisco. GN http://t.co/6T7WVjqYOE"
b'Day 19. SF. Went to see Despicable Me 2. Parked in a sidestreet outside a Bentley showroom, used syringes in the gutter. Makes you think. GN'
b"Day 19. Yesterday was a 410 mile, 13 hour slog. Can't say I enjoyed it that much if truth be told. Today we started late but enjoying SF. GN"
b'Day 19. San Francisco. Pier 39. Wanted to go on a shark watching trip but missed the boat, by about 10 hours. GN'
b'Day 18. Giant dog, giant redwood, Avenue Of The Giants. Still got 200 miles to go to San Francisco. GN http://t.co/Qm0fXbTuTf'
b'Day 18. I am a single parent of four children. Look closely and guess who. GN http://t.co/TV75IptfoE'
b'Day 18. "At last, something worth the effort." said Wilbur the talking dog. GN http://t.co/vhC6POMvDf'
b'Day 18. Driving to San Francisco today via Eureka. Hopefully no mountains to crawl around. GN'
b'Day 17. Mount Shasta. Still not doing it justice but getting better. GN http://t.co/IwKwiMv9UA'
b'Day 17. Mt Lassen. "Just wait and see how comfy she thinks I am when I fart." said Wilbur the talking dog. GN http://t.co/L4Dd0nv9Bp'
b"Day 17. Mt Lassen. Lots of volcanoes here. Quite spectacular actually, this pic doesn't do it justice. GN http://t.co/YL2zicv0aE"
b'Day 16. Virginia City. "For fuck sake, what is it with you human\'s & steam trains?" said Wilbur the talking dog. GN http://t.co/GrzsmmCRh7'
b'Day 16. Stopped off in Virginia City. An old gold mining town. GN http://t.co/07F0MRlqo4'
b"Day 16. Today we drive to Mt Lassen. I've planned a route 124 miles longer than the shortest option to try to avoid mountain roads. GN"
b"Day 15. As it turned out the children were happy to swim & make mud pies all day. Didn't even leave the camp site. That's more like it. GN"
b"Day 15. The children were so cool during our boating emergency last night we're letting them choose what we do today. When they wake up. GN"
b'Day 14. Truthfully, it turned from a lovely evening into a scary nightmare in just a few minutes. Lesson learned. GN http://t.co/M1wPHLRws0'
b'Day 14. The queue for turns to drive the boat kept getting longer. GN http://t.co/gfRR3hd0oB'
b"Day 14. 'I'm telling you, It's that way.' said Wilbur the talking dog. GN http://t.co/1gxJEUmv1g"
b'Day 14. Rented a boat to watch 4th of July fireworks from the lake. Got lost coming back in the dark. How could I get lost on a lake? GN'
b"Day 14. Lake Tahoe. Horse riding. I'm the one on the Pygmy horse. GN http://t.co/A9K0ZzQelc"
b'Day 14. Lake Tahoe. Parasailing. GN http://t.co/nHdMECfVtQ'
b"Day 13. Lake Tahoe. 'How's my tan?' Said Wilbur the talking dog. http://t.co/qJBclrX7mV"
b'Day 13. Lake Tahoe. Another pic from our sailing trip. Hoping to take kids parasailing later. Their first time. GN http://t.co/R07nlUytSP'
b'Day 13. The man who sell the boat tickets is looking after Wilbur while we sail. How friendly is that? GN http://t.co/KSYVIEifip'
b'Day 13. Sailing on Lake Tahoe at the moment. GN http://t.co/ZqglSsJdF1'
b"Day 12 (kind of). Bear Numan alone in the wild. Actually, I'm trying to ignore 300 other rafters nearby. GN http://t.co/aY4ud4XVLx"
b'Day 12. Just spent a lovely hour looking up at the night sky with Persia, wrapped in a blanket. Made me feel guilty for shouting earlier. GN'
b'Day 12. No pics today as the WiFi here is rubbish. But, drifted up a river on a rubber raft which was a lot more pleasant than it sounds. GN'
b'RT @ElectronicMagUK: Gary Numan recalls the Tubeway Army days in Electronic Sound, the new iPad music magazine... https://t.co/ulfXZOUK5X h\xe2\x80\xa6'
b"Day 12. Lake Tahoe. They also have the tiniest, but noisiest, dog. 6:45am the little shit started yapping & they CAN'T HEAR HIM. GN"
b'Day 12. Lake Tahoe. Camped next to us is a deaf family. How ironic that they are the NOISIEST bunch on the campsite. I wish I was joking. GN'
b'Day 11. Tahoe. Stayed on site all day. Watched Persia whittle a stick into a slightly smaller stick. A small dagger probably. GN'
b"Day 11. Got to Lake Tahoe last night. Scariest drive ever. 8,000' up the side of a mountain & no barrier. Road edge sheer drop. Hated it. GN"
b'Day 10. Mono Lake. Still on our way to Lake Tahoe but had to look at this place. GN http://t.co/fGIjPkWMRH'
b"Day 10. It's taking forever to reach Lake Tahoe but you just can't drive past this. Stunning. GN http://t.co/nyDQZGrA6k"
b"Day 10. 'What do you mean it feels warmer once you get in? FUCK OFF!' Said Wilbur the talking dog. GN http://t.co/3bWdDDrZ7h"
b'Day 10. On our way to Lake Tahoe, via Mono Lake and Bodie ghost town. GN'
b'Day 9. No matter where I go, what I wear or how hard I try not to, I still look like an English tourist. GN http://t.co/xFeaoIoWcp'
b'Day 9. Bass Lake. Beautiful but, today at least, seriously hot. Had the most refreshing swim of my life. GN http://t.co/Oalaka55OM'
b'Day 9. One of those tiny moments of joy. Notice the absence of children. Can there be a connection? GN http://t.co/eyxRsPyiq0'
b'Day 9. Family holidays, a parents perspective: Tiny moments of joy lost amongst an endless sea of misery. Did my parents feel like this? GN'
b'Day 9. Yosemite. Bass Lake today. Having something of a heat wave with temps around 99F today. Thought swimming might be a good plan. GN'
b'Day 8. Yosemite. Beautiful, spectacular. A stunning place. GN http://t.co/ij9QjQrq2e'
b"Tickets for the 2 Florida shows we're playing with Nine Inch Nails in October are now ON SALE. Visit http://t.co/JxkGPVXAW4 for details. GN"
b'Day 8. Yosemite. Yesterday we just nibbled at the edge. Today we are going in deep. Yosemite Valley here we come. GN'
b"Day 7. Yosemite. 'Fuck this hiking shit.' said Wilbur, the talking dog. GN http://t.co/q5oNxQVpSA"
b"Day 7. Site's called Yosemite South but turns out Yosemite's 25 miles away. 800 miles & RV's falling apart. GN http://t.co/eNjfOcudoB"
b"Day 6. Steam train. Done that. Now we're off to Yosemite. GN http://t.co/B2u5g38pN7"
b"Day 6. 'Don't like the look of that rickety old bridge' said Wilbur, the talking dog. GN http://t.co/CINVlQHD0M"
b'Day 6. Wilbur came to. Not all the passengers were best pleased. Usually people love him but not today. GN http://t.co/USDizNbUzZ'
b'Day 6. With Persia. On a steam train puffing through some Redwoods. GN http://t.co/Wdk9w2An2W'
b"Day 5. Dangerously close to Gem's bottom, the last place on Earth a dog should feel safe. Echo waits knowingly. GN http://t.co/cqtBUhZuks"
b"Day 5. Big Sur. The first river we've found in California that actually has some water in it. GN. http://t.co/l14CKfVFxp"
b"Day 5. A treasured moment, free of violence and evil. Don't know what they're thinking though. GN http://t.co/4qmACEihCd"
b'Day 5. It seems Wilbur can pull a crowd absolutely anywhere. Unlike me :( GN http://t.co/kwumPCqdQA'
b'Day 5. 17 Mile Drive. On our way to Big Sur but stopped to look at Seals. (I think) and Sea Otters. GN http://t.co/k1N70rHoX6'
b'Night 4. Monterey. We now have cosy lights. Cherries I think. We also watched World War Z  & Gemma saw a snake. GN http://t.co/brZugIPGoN'
b"Day 4. Monterey. Rain's stopped but Gemma says RV has horrible lo energy lights so we're in WalMart buying some 'cosy' lamps for it. GN"
b"Day 4. Monterey. Raining. I'm trapped in an RV with a huge wet dog, three fighting kids & a farty wife. There is a hell. GN"
b"Day 3. Pt 3. Then to Monterey. Kids a nightmare the entire trip. I swear they can fight over sunlight & then say I'm a grumpy Dad. WTF!!! GN"
b'Day 3. Pt 2. Was stopped constantly today by people asking about & photographing Wilbur. He actually drew crowds. GN http://t.co/Hqy0sew3uJ'
b"Day 3. Pt 1. Drove to Solvang. Amazing place, like a toy town for grown ups. The cutest place I think I've ever been. GN"
b'Night 2. Long day? Tired? Moi? How dare you. GN http://t.co/CM4WYDvWRV'
b"The 'Supermoon' as seen from California. It's quite beautiful. Hauntingly beautiful actually. GN http://t.co/i7pOOn8hkG"
b'Night 2. Marshmellows by the fire. GN http://t.co/O19TPd5JMA'
b'Day 2. Wilbur does lunch. In a slobbery kind of way. Wilbur is on the left. GN http://t.co/iAhIFNftnO'
b'Day 2. Santa Barbara. GN http://t.co/YlQLMJIu8L'
b'Night 1. Pt 2. Wilbur the giant dog snores like a drunk lumberjack. A range of snores as well. Counted at least 8 as I tried to sleep. GN'
b"Night 1. Pt 1. Persia fell out of bed at 3am. A 5' drop, big thump, much crying but she was okay. Made her a new bed at ground level. GN"

b'3 kids, 1 wife, 1 giant dog & a rental RV. In 48 hrs we start our epic family road trip. Dream holiday or nightmare? Could go either way. GN'

b"I've been married to Gemma 15 years today, and if it was 115 it still wouldn't be enough. I love her. Always. GN"

b"Re-sang vocals for Everything Comes Down To This, sent Ade my parts for We're The Unforgiven & wrote a new Q&A for website, on-line soon. GN"
b"Just heard Persia & Raven singing one of the new songs, they didn't know I was there. A surprisingly emotional & proud moment. GN"
b"It's our 15th wedding anniversary tomorrow. Must not forget to buy a card, must not forget to buy a card, must not forget to buy a card. GN"
b'Electrickery is fixed. Earwigs in the sockets apparently, or so claimed the man that fixed it. How disgusting is that? Rehearsals  next. GN'
b'Neil Armstrong has died. One of my greatest heroes. A genuine legend. GN'
b'RT @ElfinHaloMoon: this "thing" needs more than 6 fucking months.Dog slashing woman guilty. faces jail cuts dog 31 times http://t.co/OFU ...'
b"Panic. Start rehearsing for Reading/Bestival soon so just drove out to set up room & the electricity's vanished. EEEK! Need to fix that. GN"
b'\xe2\x80\x9c@edfielding: Morning guys :-) just a quick plug for my Gary Numan image -  please vote for me -  http://t.co/U9I9JBQq X\xe2\x80\x9d'
b"Children been away with Nan & Pop for a few days. Back home now. Really missed them. House seems to lose it's heart when they're away. GN"
b'@luvjules order via the official store at http://t.co/YLnnpBe8. Thanks! AF'
b'Finally seen the Big Noise Transmission book. Have to say, very proud of it. Ed Fielding photos are just amazing. Perfect gig capture. GN'
b'In Nottingham today. Working on the Splinter album with Ade Fenton. GN'
b"'Big Noise Transmission' out now on 3 formats. SM\nhttp://t.co/TQ7WYfCc"
b"82 degrees forecast, fantastic, BBQ planned. It's raining, bollox, BBQ cancelled. A typical UK summer. Life is too short for this shit. GN"
b"Yes, the Numan t-shirts in Top Shop are 'officially' approved. GN"
b"I see some already have their Big Noise Transmission stuff. Not seen the book myself yet. That can't be right can it :) Hope you like it. GN"
b"Should have added that it's all very exciting though. Reading & Bestival gigs soon, tour in December, these are things I love doing. GN"
b'OK today thanx, still V busy. Selling house, buying LA house, immigrating, writing new album, 3 kids, rehearsing, stuff. Life juggling. GN'
b'Started feeling little electric shocks in my face and hands today which freaked me out a bit. Took a Valium. A bit stressed I guess. GN'
b"Newspapers. Even with the best intentions it's never quite what you say or the way you say it:( Then it's retold by others & gets worse. GN"
b'No music today, head full of immigration stress. But, the rather excellent Wayne Hussey & his lovely wife Cin are staying with us. GN'
b"New vocal worked well so another song done: 'We're The Unforgiven'. Still quite light headed after a mad weekend so good effort methinks. GN"
b'Norwich UEA announcement - http://t.co/puk7WJ1R'
b'Dead Moon Falling Tour in December announced - http://t.co/dFVjRQ9o'
b"Spent today writing lyrics for yesterday's vocal idea only to realise I'd already thought up that melody about 12 years ago. Arse. GN"
b"Too much time spent on non musical things today instead of in studio. Couldn't be helped but annoying. Did get a new vocal sorted though. GN"
b'Good day with Ade Fenton yesterday working on Splinter. Album coming along great. Immigration biz today, studio again tomorrow. V busy. GN'
b"A very rare day. I loved a new song when I started this morning & I still loved it this evening. That doesn't happen very often. V happy. GN"
b"Very distracted with house buying issues today. Excited & terrified in equal measure. Made good progress on yesterday's new song though. GN"
b'Last night was huge. Buying a house over there in LaLa Land, selling a house here, real grown up stuff. Way too grown up for me actually. GN'
b"2 new songs today, no titles yet. 1 is slow & strange so I'll put that to one side, got enough of those, the other is heavy electronic. GN"
b"Sorry, I should have explained, all the new songs are for the Splinter album. We'll set a release date ASAP but not until it's recorded. GN"
b"Just finished the final vocals for a new song called 'I Am Dust'. GN"
b'\xe2\x80\x9c@edfielding: NME PHOTO AWARDS 2012 - Please vote for me x - @ElfinHaloMoon please RT http://t.co/1xf2VlfI\xe2\x80\x9d'
b'RT @edfielding: NME PHOTO AWARDS 2012 - Please vote for me x - @ElfinHaloMoon please RT http://t.co/SIzG8R4s'
b"New Steven Erikson book 'Forge Of Darkness' is out July 31. Very excited, man's a genius. I'd Follow him if I could find him on Twitter. GN"
b'RT @MoonbearGirl: @ElfinHaloMoon Gemma and Gary, could u sign petition for http://t.co/dERWZARu. China has rejected ban on use of Tiger  ...'
b'On a slightly lighter note, took the Fimble to see Magic Mike today (the film). Surprisingly good I thought. GN'
b'Just read that 1 of the women who did this evil thing will be let out of prison early. How can that be? Sickening. GN http://t.co/DOzGQ7m4'
b'A Fimble. GN http://t.co/aN9PtIpz'
b'Gary Numan interview in Issue One of new @electronicmaguk - out now:\nhttp://t.co/GbDpdL6L'
b"I am now sitting in a very lovely hotel room with someone that looks remarkably like a Fimble that's been beaten up. GN"
b"Finished writing the song I started last week. I quite like it. In Manchester for the next 4 days as Gemma's having a 'Face Smoothie'. GN"
b"New song today, should have lyrics done tomorrow. No title yet. Working title is My Safe & Lone Obsession but that's a bit of a mouthful. GN"
b"Just wrote another new song. This one is called Lost. Another shitty summer day but luckily I do seem to work better when it's raining. GN"
b'Big Noise Transmission deluxe book/CD is released on August 20th and is available to pre-order now - http://t.co/blvy8bi1'
b'Big Noise Transmission - new live CD, DVD & ltd edition deluxe book/CD. Pre-order it now at the official Numan Store - http://t.co/TQ7WYfCc'
b'So, last night a large crowd of cheering people, this morning my large dog has just farted in my face. Back to normal then. GN'
b"Just got to GuilFest. A bit muddy but ok. We're on at 10pm. Got to get up at 6am as Persia has a trampoline competition. Rock n roll. GN"
b"Sheep Pt 3. I'm not a farmer, they're pet's & we love them. After the sheep 'flipping' I went back to the studio. Strange life. GN"
b"Sheep Pt 2. Tipped him over to see wound & check for fly strike. That's when I lost ring. He's good but we were 2 late. 2 are pregnant. GN"
b"Sheep. We have 8, all pets. All sent to us as girls but someone snuck in a boy. He was 'done' last week & I was checking healing. More... GN"
b"Wrote a new chorus for 'Here In The Black' today. Decided the one I wrote yesterday was rubbish after all. Typical. GN"
b'Only 2 days to go now until Guilfest, where Gary is performing on Saturday night - \nhttp://t.co/oXXSOgJn'
b"Wrote another new song today 'Here In The Black'. Ade is now working on the one I sent him last week 'The Dark In Me'. Progress is good. GN"
b'Karin Park @karinpark will be supporting Gary at the Reading & Norwich shows in September - \nhttp://t.co/rmL1hS1L'
b"So Lennox was put down this morning. His crime simply being part Pit Bull and so 'unpredictable'. Like ALL humans then. Utterly shameful. GN"
b'Go to http://t.co/5J6RUYLZ and sign the petition. He has just hours left to live. #savelennox GN'
b'Really hope you can all help with this. Poor little dog. #savelennox GN'
b"New Guardian piece about 'Cars being 'one of the greatest singles in the history of pop''. SM \n\nhttp://t.co/KROMDnrN"
b'Gary went out for lunch (fries, of course!) with Q Magazine recently. The 1 page chat is in the new August issue:\nhttp://t.co/lbGI3y7M'
b'Found my wedding ring amidst layers of sheep poo. I thought metal detectors were a joke but they actually work. \xc2\xa3150 well spent. V happy. GN'
b'New interview with Gary in The Telegraph. SM \n\nhttp://t.co/UNC0jCAK'
b'Rubbish weekend. Bloc Festival cancelled & I lost my wedding ring yesterday whilst wrestling a sheep to check for Fly Strike. GN'
b"So upset that Bloc is cancelled. Just woke up to the bad news. Feel sad for everyone, fans, DJ's & bands. Should have been special. GN"
b'Bloc Festival is cancelled. See here for further info - http://t.co/bW9pvYQT'
b'Only a day to go now until @BLOCWKND on Saturday night - \nhttp://t.co/PotqR5KC'
b"Today I ended up writing 3 new chorus melodies for a song I thought was finished. Now I'm just confused. Might keep all 3. GN"
b"A much better day. Another new song on it's way to Ade Fenton. With luck I will have another one done tomorrow, just the vocal to do. GN"
b"Just a reminder that Gary is on Janice Long's Radio 2 show after midnight tonight -\n \nhttp://t.co/uJfQ6JHX"
b"A typical studio day today. Loved a new song at 9am, it was shit by 12, couldn't decide if it was great or crap by 7pm. More tomorrow. GN"
b'We are on stage at 6pm this Saturday at @BLOCWKND. AF'
b'RT @r8rrc: Gary Numan sounding marvellous @HopFarmFestival'
b'Brilliant gig at Hop Farm Festival tonight. Thanks to everyone that came along. Bloc next Saturday, Guilfest on the 15th. See you there. AF'
b'Just played Hop Farm. Absolutely loved it. Great gig. GN'
b"We're all looking forward to Hop Farm later. We are on stage in the Big Tent at 6.20pm. See you all there. AF"
b'RT @wired: Synthesize this: Trent Reznor, cEvin Key, Gary Numan in upcoming modular synth documentary http://t.co/7aMAHzFs'
b'Not long to go now until the Hop Farm Festival on 30 June - with Primal Scream & Maximo Park in the Big Tent. http://t.co/Dy1xIASi'

b"Enterprise 2. 2 hrs later, after being on hold 4 an hour, on a mobile, they dump us & say the car we can't drive is our problem. Wankers. GN"
b'Enterprise Car Rental. Utter shit. Broke down in LA petrol garage forecourt, 3 adults 3 little kids. 3 hrs later nu car arrives but 5 seater'
b"RT @theQuietus: John Doran reviews Gary Numan's recent London gig for @TheStoolPigeon http://t.co/JZYE7bgO @numanofficial"

b'The tour is over. Absolutely loved it. It could not have finished with a better show in Brighton. Fantastic night. Thank you every one. GN'
b'Awesome show in Brighton tonight. Brilliant tour, thank you so much to everyone that showed their support for us over the last two weeks. AF'
b'Brighton today. Film crew & new lights are loading in at The Dome. Guests are on their way, should be a fantastic last night to the tour. GN'
b"The Guardian list of the Best Number 1 Singles ever. 'Are 'Friends' Electric? picked as the best single from 1979: http://t.co/eyPebfgY"
b"Cardiff tonight was so good, the best Cardiff crowd I've ever had, loved every minute of it. Brighton tomorrow, last night of tour. GN"
b'Last night in London? Unbelievable, just amazing. The aftershow party at Chris McCormacks Jubilee Club in Camden was the best. Thank you. GN'
b"Last night of the tour in Brighton tomorrow (Sunday). Limited number of tickets left but they're going fast . . . \n\nhttp://t.co/BEJmor6E"
b'In case you missed it Gary @6music yesterday: \nhttp://t.co/rOsbMgt1'
b'London. Standing at the back of the stage watching Officers. Just brilliant. GN'
b'ps on shaun  keaveny @bbc6music breakfast show.x'
b'Garys on BBC 6 Music in 10 mins.... SM'
b"Had a good day in Birmingham. Rrussell Bell & Chris Payne are here again tonight. Might join us for more than Ced's tribute this time. GN"
b'Cambridge, a surprisingly good night. Thanks to everyone for coming along. Birmingham tomorrow, not played there for a while. GN'
b'Bristol, slippiest stage on Earth. Could barely move without my feet sliding sway. A tad distracting to be honest. Great fans though. GN'
b"Officers just started their set in Bristol. Every night I'm late getting ready listening to them play. Love them, great band. GN"
b'In Bristol. Just sound checking Love Needs No Disguise with Chris Payne & Rrussell Bell. GN'
b"Short Tyne Tees interview with Gary in Newcastle about the Films Competition winner for 'Dominion Day', Neil Pascoe. \nhttp://t.co/ZC6DK0Tt"
b'Just leaving Bournemouth & soon I will go to bed. When I wake up I will be in  Bristol. Really looking forward to the Bristol show. GN'
b'Rrussell, Chris and me after the Bournemouth show. We had a good time and we love you Cedric. GN http://t.co/38bevra8'
b"Just arrived at the Bournemouth O2 Academy. Rrussell Bell and Chris Payne are here to play on Ced's tribute tonight. GN"
b'Day off in Bournemouth. Very lovely. Ravey Davey Brooks is back, big thanks to Presley for helping out on keys for the last 4 shows. GN'
b'Best show of the tour so far last night in Dublin. Thanks to everyone who made it so exciting. AF'
b'Happy 50th to our esteemed tour manager @katherinewedgeley, otherwise known as Andrew Keightley. AF http://t.co/mdctLX36'
b'Dublin? How absolutely amazing was that???? Thank you so much!!! GN'
b'Been walking around Dublin today. Such a cool, vibey city. Music everywhere, people are so friendly. On stage in about one hour. GN'
b'Our crew take a well earned rest on the Holyhead - Dublin ferry. AF http://t.co/iGOFHCoY'
b'Sheffield was epic last night. Loved that one. On the ferry to Dublin now. GN'
b'Getting ready for the show, Officers playing live in the background. Perfect,  love that band. GN'
b'Playing Sheffield tonight at the O2 Academy. Filmed an interview with Officers today for Soundsphere (http://t.co/QCwVO8HM). GN'
b"I'm told Tyne Tees TV news item now likely to go out on monday. GN"
b'More guests will be joining us throughout the tour here and there. Newcastle tonight, should be on a Tyne Tees TV news item this evening. GN'
b'Rico joined us on stage last night for Crazier. Great to see him again. He has to put out another album asap, it would be a crime not to. GN'
b'The Shadowplay festival in Belgium has been cancelled.'
b'Great gig at Glasgow tonight. Brilliant crowd, thanks to everyone for coming. On our way to Newcastle now. AF'

b'Just watching Officers set in Glasgow. Absolutely brilliant!! GN'

b'Leicester is done. Great night. I have rarely felt so unprepared but I think it went well. Thanks to everyone that came out to see us.GN'
